DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IV , randomize , double-blind , comparative study use two preparation ethinyl estradiol cyproterone acetate treatment menstrual irregularity hyper-androgenic origin .
DOC.brief_title: Ethinyl Estradiol Cyproterone Acetate Irregular Menstruation
DOC.criteria: Female subject Premenopausal subject 18 year old Medical history irregular menses last least 3 month Signature inform consent Pregnancy Use hormonal contraceptive within 3 month screen Primary bilateral oophorectomy Chemotherapy / radiotherapy within 6 month screen Hysterectomy Myotonic dystrophy Galactosemia Galactorrhea History tuberculosis schistosomiasis Elevated prolactin / significant laboratory alteration Diabetes Premature ovarian deficiency Sensitivity component drug formula
